definition: Xujiahui, an area in 徐匯區|徐汇区[Xu2 hui4 qu1], Xuhui district, central Shanghai

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: This dissertation is the history of Xujiahui, a Catholic community in Shanghai, from three perspectives.
sentences.chinese: 本文以上海徐家汇教堂区为研究对象。

sentences.english: Shanghai urban culture is represented and the Bund Xujiahui area.
sentences.chinese: 上海都市文化的代表是徐家汇和外滩一带。

sentences.english: Xujiahui is the command center, the Bund is the front.
sentences.chinese: 徐家汇是指挥中心，外滩是前沿阵地。

definition: Wujiaochang neighborhood of Shanghai, adjacent to Fudan University
Chuansha, name of street and park in Pudong New District 浦東新區|浦东新区[Pu3 dong1 xin1 qu1], Shanghai
Putuo district, central Shanghai/Putuo district of Zhoushan city 舟山市[Zhou1 shan1 shi4], Zhejiang
Pudong New District, subprovincial district of Shanghai
